modName: MDRT - More Death Reload Time - Skyrim Edition
summary: Delays savegame loading after the player dies.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=64] MDRT - More Death Reload Time [/size]
                                   [color=lightblue]Skyrim Edition[/b][/color]

Based on the FO3 and FNV mod, MDRT delays the auto loading of your last saved game after the player dies so that you can see and hear what happens. 


---INSTALLATION----

Just download using the Nexus Download Manager and enable it from there.
author: Rhystic1
